Articles.Content:
My map often displays orbit lines for contracts - some of them are only offered contracts that I haven't even accepted.

How do I hide these orbits - especially for the available contracts? They're just adding noise to my map view.

Not sure if this is introduced via a mod, but in the Tracking Station at the top, there is a toolbar to enable/disable displaying various craft types and on the right, there was a recent addition of options for waypoints and orbits both active and offered.
That must be a mod...I also had it with one of my mods, but it's not in stock. Perhaps Contract Configurator did it?
